Welcome to my personal website. I am a data analytics professional with more than a decade of experience leading teams and projects across different industries and types of organizations.

I am also an adjuct professor of data science at George Washington University's [School of Media and Public Affairs](https://smpa.gwu.edu/){target="_blank"}.

I earned my Ph.D. in political science (quantitative focus) from the [University of Pennsylvania](https://www.polisci.upenn.edu/){target="_blank"} in 2022.

I am open to [new connections](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nicholasbellphd){target="_blank"} with data analytics professionals, industry PhDs, R enthusiasts, and anyone with a curiosity about my work. My LinkedIn profile is below.
